description: Marcus is a studly 23 year old bar tender.This hottie loves to lift weights, snowboard and basically do anything else that's physical. He's very healthy, and you can tell when he takes his shirt off he takes pride in the way he looks. No smoking and very little drinking for this one. At night as a bar tender in the club district, he's always meeting and hooking up with beautiful women. Marcus is very playful and full of energy. He was a blast to film and even better, he's a blast to watch. Enjoy Marcus as he strokes himself in the living room, strokes himself in the shower and blows his load while lying back on the sofa.
title: Marcus
